name: Carrot Cake
description: Our carrot cake is a moist fluffy sweet tender classic two layered cake , packed with flavour and topped with the most delicious decadent cream cheese frosting.

name: Trio Mousse Cake
description: Trio Mousse cake is a soft mousse cake consistibg of whipped cream flavoured with layers of dark chocolate , milk chocolate, white chocolate.

name: Jim Jam Cookies
description: Jim Jam Cookies is a shortbread cookie with two layers sandwitched with a filling of raspberry jam. Available in a pack of 200 gms.

name: Cranberry Cookies
description: Cranberry cookie is a cookie rolled out of sweet buttery cookie having dried cranberries. Available in a pack of 170 gms.

name: Grilled Pesto Paneer sandwich
description: Veg Club Sandwich is a traditional sandwich with veggies, mayonnaise filling , diced tomatoes layered in brown bread slices , grilled to perfection.

name: Paneer Khurchan Sandwich
description: Paneer Khurchan Sandwich is a sliced brown bread sandwich filled with seasoned paneer /cottage cheese, tossed with bell peppers , grilled to perfection.
